title: Potential Sale/Trade  1908 American League Publishing Company Ty Cobb
author: mrreality68

posts.post_title: Potential Sale/Trade  1908 American League Publishing Company Ty Cobb
posts.post_content:
Hi Everyone

For a Potential Sale or For Trade (or a Combo) The trade would be for Joe Jackson or Babe Ruth Cards.

I am taking offers for my 1908 American League Publishing Co Ty Cobb Post Card.

I know some do not like when we say taking offers (sorry to those but for this card that is how I am doing it)

Being Transparent I am also emotional attached to this card as both a Collector and do to its Rarity (less then 6 to 9 known to exist) so it will be hard for me to let go if I do

Feel free to PM me
I used to own this one. Love this card.

[quote name="calvindog" post=2269247]I used to own this one. Love this card.[/QUOTE]

Dido
What's the metal he is wearing represent--(champion batting leader ?)-curious if anyone have that pin in their private collection-??

[quote name="Directly" post=2269555]What's the metal he is wearing represent--(champion batting leader ?)-curious if anyone have that pin in their private collection-??[/QUOTE]
American League Champoinship medal I believe.

[quote name="Directly" post=2269555]What's the metal he is wearing represent--(champion batting leader ?)-curious if anyone have that pin in their private collection-??[/QUOTE]

Correct, was given to Cobb for winning the 07 AL batting crown.

THanks everyone and it is a Great card and I am happy to keep it in my collection or move it if the terms are right from both the buyer/trader and I.

Great Card. Rare. And I Love the double image of Cobb.

thanks and bump

waiting to hear the right offer
